about_the_game:
Join our ninja basketball goblin girl from the past, Himari, on a mission to save the city from a robot invasion! Resurrected five years after her death, she teams up with friends, Ikari, Tatsumi, & Kimiko in a short Metroidvania full of tight platforming, unlockables, and secrets.
Race against time in speedrunning or take your time unlocking characters & see the story unfold!

  • A narrative-driven, single-player goblin girl adventure with a charming cast of monster girl characters and a touching story of friendship
  • A massive robot fortress teeming with 40+ rooms of hardcore platforming challenges and devious secrets
  • Many color alts and characters to unlock, built for only the most clever ninja basketbrawlers
  • Tons of original chiptune music goodness consisting of catchy 8-bit beats.
  • Lightning-fast respawns to keep on brawling as you uncover the mysteries of the robot fortress!

name: Basket Brawl DX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a quest with Himari and her friends! Traverse 40+ rooms, unlock characters, and groove to chiptune tunes in this speedy platformer.
